Attributes.description: Precursors and consequences of the war; military, political, cultural, social, and economic histories of how the war shaped and reflected its global context. Themes include totalitarianism, genocide, and imperialism and decolonization.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Wed, Start Time: 16:00, End Time: 19:00, Building: Orchard, Room: Commons
